Uses of Class
uk.ac.nottingham.psyja2.ATCSimulator.Instruction

  • Packages that use Instruction 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.nottingham.psyja2.ATCSimulator  

    • Uses of Instruction in uk.ac.nottingham.psyja2.ATCSimulator

      Subclasses of Instruction in uk.ac.nottingham.psyja2.ATCSimulator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AltitudeInstruction
      An instruction to make an aircraft climb/decend to an assigned altitude
      class  HeadingInstruction
      Instruction to make an aircraft turn to a given heading.
      class  HoldInstruction
      An instruction to make an aircraft circle in it's current location.
      class  SpeedInstruction
      An instruction to make an aircraft reduce/increase its speed to an assigned value
      class  WaypointInstruction
      An instruction to make an aircraft fly directly to a navigation Waypoint When the aircraft reaches the waypoint it will continue on its current trajectory

      Will be called when an instruction completes

      Issue an instruction to an aircraft
